needs: Kwame seeks to deliver measurable data science outcomes by clarifying goals, constraints, and signals early, optimizing processes for simplicity and accountability. They aim to reduce false positives and campaign costs while maintaining robust governance and clear communication across functions with timely, incremental delivery and effective instrumentation in complex, ambiguous environments.
personality: Kwame communicates with directness and transparency, valuing data-driven decision-making and evidence-based learning. They foster collaboration through clear documentation, mentorship, and inclusive practices. Their work style emphasizes readable code, humane processes, early surfacing of unknowns, pragmatic experimentation, and continuous improvement, all oriented toward reducing complexity and maintaining clear accountability.
